sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS totCnt FROM OE1TNMETADATAREQUESTINFO A WHERE PROCESS_STTUS_CODE != '01'
JOB_SE_CODE = #srchJobSeCode#
(SELECT MBER_NM FROM OE1TNUSERINFO X WHERE A.APPLCNT_ID = X.MBER_ID) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#srchApplcntNm#),'%')
PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = #srchProcessSttusCode#
REQST_DE BETWEEN #srchReqstDeStart# AND #srchReqstDeEnd#

SELECT REQST_PROCESS_ID reqstProcessId , REQST_PROCESS_SN reqstProcessSn , JOB_SE_CODE jobSeCode , (SELECT X.CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD X WHERE X.CODE_ID = 'OE1103' AND X.CODE = A.JOB_SE_CODE) jobSe , REQST_DE reqstDe , (SELECT X.MBER_NM FROM OE1TNUSERINFO X WHERE A.APPLCNT_ID = X.MBER_ID) applcntNm , REQST_PRVONSH reqstPrvonsh , (SELECT X.CODE_NM FROM OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD X WHERE X.CODE_ID = 'OE1104' AND X.CODE = A.PROCESS_STTUS_CODE) processSttus , PROCESS_DE processDe , (SELECT X.MBER_NM FROM OE1TNUSERINFO X WHERE A.OPETR_ID = X.MBER_ID) opetrNm , PROCESS_PRVONSH processPrvonsh FROM OE1TNMETADATAREQUESTINFO A WHERE REQST_PROCESS_ID = #reqstProcessId# AND REQST_PROCESS_SN = #reqstProcessSn#
SELECT NVL(MAX(A.REQST_PROCESS_SN),0) AS sn FROM OE1TNMETADATAREQUESTINFO A WHERE A.REQST_PROCESS_ID = #reqstProcessId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO OE1TNMETADATAREQUESTINFO ( REQST_PROCESS_ID , REQST_PROCESS_SN , JOB_SE_CODE , REQST_DE , APPLCNT_ID , REQST_PRVONSH , PROCESS_STTUS_CODE , PROCESS_DE , OPETR_ID , PROCESS_PRVONSH , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #reqstProcessId# , #reqstProcessSn# , #jobSeCode# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , #applcntId# , #reqstPrvonsh# , #processSttusCode# , #processDe# , #opetrId# , #processPrvonsh# , SYSDATE , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE , #frstRegisterId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE OE1TNMETADATAREQUESTINFO SET REQST_DE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , REQST_PRVONSH = #reqstPrvonsh# , PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = #processSttusCode# , PROCESS_DE = #processDe# , OPETR_ID = #opetrId# , PROCESS_PRVONSH = #processPrvonsh# , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE , LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE REQST_PROCESS_ID = #reqstProcessId# AND REQST_PROCESS_SN = #reqstProcessSn#

UPDATE OE1TNMETADATAREQUESTINFO SET PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = #processSttusCode# , PROCESS_DE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , OPETR_ID = #opetrId# , PROCESS_PRVONSH = #processPrvonsh# , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE , LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE REQST_PROCESS_ID = #reqstProcessId# AND REQST_PROCESS_SN = #reqstProcessSn#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM OE1TNMETADATAREQUESTINFO WHERE REQST_PROCESS_ID = #reqstProcessId# AND REQST_PROCESS_SN = #reqstProcessSn#
